fullText: James Graham's fact-based drama about the transformation of The Sun into a tabloid juggernaut is an energetic ensemble piece that captures the frenzied atmosphere of a newsroom in transition.
dtliExcerpt: James Graham's fact-based drama about the transformation of The Sun into a tabloid juggernaut is an energetic ensemble piece that captures the frenzied atmosphere of a newsroom in transition.
